languages.text: "Не верьте, Лорд-капитан! Блеклая зелень сочится сквозь каждое слово — я знаю этот обманчивый оттенок. Речи Фелека, полные сладости и смирения, я некогда принимала за искренность. А они были... ядом".

"Do not believe him, Lord Captain! Pale green is seeping from his every word, and I know this colour of deceit well. I once mistook Felek's words, so humble and full of sweetness, for sincerity. In truth, they were... poison."
languages.original_text: "Не верьте, Лорд-капитан! Блеклая зелень сочится сквозь каждое слово — я знаю этот обманчивый оттенок. Речи Фелека, полные сладости и смирения, я некогда принимала за искренность. А они были... ядом".

traits.locale_text: "Do not believe his words, Lord Captain! Pale green is seeping from his every word, and I know this colour of deceit well. I once mistook Felek's words, so humble and full of sweetness, for sincerity. In truth, they were... poison."

"Do not believe him, Lord Captain! Pale green is seeping from his every word, and I know this colour of deceit well. I once mistook Felek's words, so humble and full of sweetness, for sincerity. In truth, they were... poison."

languages.text: "Glaubt ihm nicht, Lord Captain! Blasses Grün trieft aus jedem seiner Worte, und ich kenne diese Farbe der Täuschung gut. Ich habe Feleks Worte schon einmal für Aufrichtigkeit gehalten, so demütig und süß waren sie. In Wahrheit waren sie ... Gift."
languages.original_text: "Do not believe him, Lord Captain! Pale green is seeping from his every word, and I know this colour of deceit well. I once mistook Felek's words, so humble and full of sweetness, for sincerity. In truth, they were... poison."

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt ihm nicht, Lord Captain! Blasses Grün trieft aus jedem seiner Worte, und ich kenne diese Farbe der Täuschung gut. Ich habe Feleks Worte schon einmal für Aufrichtigkeit gehalten, so demütig und süß waren sie. In Wahrheit waren sie ... Gift."

languages.text: « Ne l'écoutez pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Chacun de ses mots suinte un vert pâle que je reconnaîtrais entre mille : c'est la couleur de la traîtrise. Un jour, j'ai moi-même cru à la sincérité des paroles de Felek, de par leur modestie et leur douceur, alors que dans les faits, elles étaient emplies de... poison. »
languages.original_text: "Do not believe him, Lord Captain! Pale green is seeping from his every word, and I know this colour of deceit well. I once mistook Felek's words, so humble and full of sweetness, for sincerity. In truth, they were... poison."

traits.locale_text: « Ne l'écoutez pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Chacun de ses mots suinte un vert pâle que je reconnaîtrais entre mille : c'est la couleur de la traîtrise. Un jour, j'ai moi-même cru à la sincérité des paroles de Felek, de par leur modestie et leur douceur, alors que dans les faits, elles étaient emplies de... poison. »

languages.text: “不要相信他的话，舰长大人！他的每句话都透露着淡淡的绿色，我很清楚这种充满谎言的颜色。我曾误以为费雷克的话是真诚的。他是那么谦逊，他的话是那么甜蜜，可实际上，那不过是……毒药罢了。”
languages.original_text: "Do not believe him, Lord Captain! Pale green is seeping from his every word, and I know this colour of deceit well. I once mistook Felek's words, so humble and full of sweetness, for sincerity. In truth, they were... poison."

traits.locale_text: “不要相信他的话，舰长大人！他的每句话都透露着淡淡的绿色，我很清楚这种充满谎言的颜色。我曾误以为费雷克的话是真诚的。他是那么谦逊，他的话是那么甜蜜，可实际上，那不过是……毒药罢了。”

languages.text: 「彼を信じてはいけません、ロード・キャプテン！彼の言葉からは、淡緑色がにじみ出ています。あたくしはその欺瞞の色をよく知っている。かつてフェレックの、謙虚で甘美に満ちた言葉を信じてしまったのです。本当は…毒だったのに」
languages.original_text: "Do not believe him, Lord Captain! Pale green is seeping from his every word, and I know this colour of deceit well. I once mistook Felek's words, so humble and full of sweetness, for sincerity. In truth, they were... poison."

traits.locale_text: 「彼を信じてはいけません、ロード・キャプテン！彼の言葉からは、淡緑色がにじみ出ています。私はその欺瞞の色をよく知っている。かつてフェレックの、謙虚で甘美に満ちた言葉を信じてしまったんです。本当は…毒だったのに」

languages.text: «¡No confíe en él, Lord Capitán! Cada palabra que dice tiene un tono verde pálido, y conozco bien ese engañoso color. Una vez Felek me engatusó con sus humildes y dulces palabras, que al final no eran más que veneno».
languages.original_text: "Do not believe him, Lord Captain! Pale green is seeping from his every word, and I know this colour of deceit well. I once mistook Felek's words, so humble and full of sweetness, for sincerity. In truth, they were... poison."

traits.locale_text: «¡No confíe en él, Lord Capitán! Cada palabra que dice tiene un tono verde pálido, y conozco bien ese engañoso color. Una vez Felek me engatusó con sus humildes y dulces palabras, que al final no eran más que veneno».

languages.text: "Ona inanma Lord Kaptan! Her sözünden soluk yeşil sızıyor. Yalanın rengidir bu, iyi bilirim. Bir keresinde Felek'in pek mütevazı ve nezaketle dolu sözlerini samimi sanmıştım. Meğer zehirmiş."
languages.original_text: "Do not believe him, Lord Captain! Pale green is seeping from his every word, and I know this colour of deceit well. I once mistook Felek's words, so humble and full of sweetness, for sincerity. In truth, they were... poison."

traits.locale_text: "Ona inanma Lord Kaptan! Her sözünden soluk yeşil sızıyor. Yalanın rengidir bu, iyi bilirim. Bir keresinde Felek'in pek mütevazı ve nezaketle dolu sözlerini samimi sanmıştım. Meğer zehirmiş."
